features: MOISTURIZING+ FORMULA - Formulated with 5 powerful moisturizing, and vitamins-rich agents that dramatically improves your intimate shaving experience; Jojoba Oil / Avocado Oil / Aloe Vera / Shea Butter / Maca Root.
With the strengths of MOISTURIZING+ agents, COOCHY PLUS Intimate Shave Cream is developed based on the most-trusted intimate shave cream formula. Safe for most skin types. Made in USA.

INTIMATE & UNIVERSAL - Because COOCHY PLUS is formulated for the most intimate areas of the body, it can also be safely used on any other parts of the body. Helps soften even the most coarse body hair, such as pubic hair or underarm hair.

INTIMATE GUARD - To prevent razor bumps, in-grown hairs, razor burn, or rash caused by traditional shaving products, MOITURIZING+ agents softens the hair, and forms an invisible shield on your skin to deliver close shaves that do not leave marks or damage your intimate skin.
FRAGRANCE FREE - With zero artificial scents or additives, alcohol-free, phthalates-free, and paraben-free. Suitable for extra sensitive skin types.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Coochy Plus Intimate Shave Cream - Trusted for 30 years Coochy, a brand synonymous with the best intimate shave cream for over 30 years, is proud to introduce the latest advancement in both shaving and sensual experience. Coochy Plus is the latest iteration in luxury Intimate Shaving Cream that will ensure a superior shaving experience, specifically formulated for women’s most private, sensitive, and intimate areas.

Moisturizing+ - Invisible shield that you can feel Use it every time you shave to leave skin soft, smooth, and moisturized. Coochy Plus works by forming an invisible shield on your skin to aid in a closer shave than ever before. Patent-pending MOISTURIZING+ formula is an intricate balance of 5 powerful moisturizing, and vitamins-rich agents that dramatically improve your intimate shaving experience; Jojoba Oil / Avocado Oil / Aloe Vera / Shea Butter / Maca Root.

Say Good-Bye to Razor Bump & In-Grown Hair No more ingrown hair, razor bumps, irritation, or itchiness. The patent-pending formula helps to soften even the most coarse body hair, such as pubic hair and underarm hair. Enjoy a closer shave thanks to the protective barrier COOCHY PLUS forms on your skin. This invisible shield ensures skin suffers no marks or damage from the razor.

Intimate Safe Don't take our word for it, trust the 30+ years of track records. Need more? The Coochy Plus is HRIPT cleared (Human Repeat Insult Patch Test) and dermatologist-tested. Because you know, we care.

The Only 1-2-3 intimate shaving system you need Get the complete 1-2-3 intimate shaving experience. Starts with NOURIA Pre-Shave Elixir to condition the skin and hair prior to shaving. Then shave with the most luxurious bump-free intimate shave cream. Finish with Intimate After Shave Protection Moisturizer that delivers hours of hydrating properties long after you shave. With Coochy Plus, intimate shaving is an experience, not a chore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using it for years
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff, I have been using it for years. I always had a lot of trouble with razor burn and sensitive skind and this stuff is probably the best shaving product I have used. It definitely helps keep razor burn to a minimum and it's not loaded with a bunch of toxic ingredients which is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Shaving Cream for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loved this shaving cream! It’s fragrance-free, pH balanced, and has a clear color. Paired with the Venus Intimate Razor, it’s been a game-changer. After using it twice, I can confidently say no razor bumps. Perfect for sensitive skin – highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this shaving cream! I hope they never discontinue it, I'm totally obsessed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like but I thought you would not need a razor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using it all over my body and it hasn’t caused any kind of irritation to my lady parts whatsoever and it’s moisturizing too so that’s a plus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Keeps bimbs under control. Softens area for a easier shave

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a very cleanly shaven woman and was having issues regulating my ph. I can keep clean and healthy down there with Coochy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have extremely sensitive skin (I'm allergic to all dyes, fragrances, etc) and this is the only shaving cream that doesn't make my skin freak out. I've tried so so SO many products with no success but -THIS- this right here is the real MVP. No more razor burn, no more ingrown hairs, no more arm pit boils! I'm so impressed. Honestly just give it a shot.
